mapper.select: SELECT practice_answear.u_id, pr_subject, pr_score, pr_id, a_name FROM practice_answear,apply where practice_answear.u_id = apply.u_id ORDER BY u_id, pr_subject, pr_score DESC;

SELECT practice_answear.u_id, pr_subject, pr_score, pr_id, a_name FROM practice_answear,apply where practice_answear.u_id = apply.u_id and ${type} like #{keyword} ORDER BY u_id, pr_subject, pr_score DESC;

SELECT pa.u_id, pa.pr_subject, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(pa.pr_score) as avg_value, MAX(pa.pr_score) as max_value, SUM(CASE WHEN pa.pr_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as qua_num, a.a_name FROM practice_answear pa JOIN apply a ON pa.u_id = a.u_id GROUP BY pa.u_id, pa.pr_subject, a.a_name ORDER BY pa.u_id, pa.pr_subject;

SELECT pa.u_id, pa.pr_subject, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(pa.pr_score) as avg_value, MAX(pa.pr_score) as max_value, SUM(CASE WHEN pa.pr_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as qua_num, a.a_name FROM practice_answear pa JOIN apply a ON pa.u_id = a.u_id WHERE ${type} like #{keyword} GROUP BY pa.u_id, pa.pr_subject, a.a_name ORDER BY pa.u_id, pa.pr_subject;
